name: Jessica's Adventure
description:
You are Jessica and you head into a dungeon - maybe.
There are 2 good endings and a couple or so bad ones.
This was a project for my game development course, and I'm not sure whether I'll ever update this again.
There's no sound because I didn't have time, and everything else were free assets. 

I tried to be a bit funny, but the story was pretty rushed out. Make of that what you will.
If you can still have a little fun then be my guest ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
